issue.title: Shop validation : add a "agree with conditions... " check before validate & placeholder
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

* As the user that authorize/validates has to validates the terms and conditions of the platform, we propose to add a checkbox, like in the basket.
* Also add a placeholder in the remark field to explain that it is mandatory to reject the order

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated the proposal.
